explains: n. 暖气片，散热器；（暖气片型）燃油炉，电热器；（车辆或飞机发动机的）冷却器，水箱；辐射体，辐射源
wordGroup: heat radiator n. 散热器；热辐射器；散热片
heating radiator 供暖散热片；热辐射器
radiator fin 散热片；散热器片
radiator cap 水箱盖；散热器盖
cast iron radiator 催化燃烧；铸铁制散热器
radiator grille 水箱，水箱饰罩

sentences.en: The hostage had been shackled to a radiator.
sentences.cn: 当时人质被铐在暖气片上。

sentences.en: Wade placed his chilled hands on the radiator and warmed them.
sentences.cn: 韦德把他冰冷的双手放到散热器上取暖。

sentences.en: You will need to drain the central heating system before you replace the radiator.
sentences.cn: 你得先把中央供暖系统的水排净再更换散热器。
